Function:

drawPoint

Description:

画圆点。Draws a circular point (dot) with customizable fill color, stroke color, radius, and stroke width. Useful for creating data points, markers, or decorative elements.

Returns:

This function does not return a value

Example:
// Basic filled circle without stroke
const canvas = document.getElementById('myCanvas');
const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
drawPoint(ctx, { x: 50, y: 50 }, '#ff0000', '#ffffff', 10, 0);
Example:
// Circle with both fill and stroke
drawPoint(ctx, { x: 100, y: 100 }, '#0066cc', '#ffffff', 15, 2);
Example:
// Creating data points for a scatter plot
const dataPoints = [
  { x: 20, y: 30 },
  { x: 40, y: 60 },
  { x: 80, y: 45 }
];
dataPoints.forEach(point => {
  drawPoint(ctx, point, '#ff6600', '#333333', 8, 1);
});
